meanings.sent1: The infiltrative vines slowly spread across the garden.
meanings.sent2: The infiltrative spy quietly made his way into the enemy's headquarters.
meanings.sent3: The infiltrative squirrel sneaked into the bird feeder for a snack.
meanings.sent4: Her infiltrative charm seeped into his heart, making him fall in love.
meanings.sent5: The infiltrative fog crept through the valley, obscuring everything in its path.

meanings.sent1: The infiltrative tactics of the undercover agents were highly effective.
meanings.sent2: The infiltrative nature of the disease made it difficult to detect.
meanings.sent3: The infiltrative cat managed to get into the house through an open window.
meanings.sent4: His infiltrative gaze seemed to see right through her facade.
meanings.sent5: The infiltrative silence in the room was broken only by the ticking of the clock.

meanings.sent1: The infiltrative water slowly seeped through the cracks in the wall.
meanings.sent2: The infiltrative roots of the tree extended deep into the ground.
meanings.sent3: The infiltrative aroma of freshly baked cookies wafted through the house.
meanings.sent4: His infiltrative questions probed into areas others dared not explore.
meanings.sent5: The infiltrative warmth of the sun enveloped her in a comforting embrace.
